Home.Name: Elaine Huynh
Home.Intro: Full-Stack Software Engineer with experience building web-technologies.

About.Bio: Hello! My name is Elaine, I'm full-stack software engineer with an interest in web technologies. While I was working as a COVID ICU nurse in 2020, I started teaching myself how to build websites as a new hobby. Now I make web applications for my friends, family, and small businesses. I decided to pivot my career path and dive deeper into solidfying my fundementals in web development. Outside of developing and nursing, I spend my free time reading about naturopathic health, exploring new restaurants in Seattle, and most importantly is time with my family.

Projects.Title: Calendar
Projects.About: Inspired by my own calendar app, I wanted to recreate an app to share with my friends and family. This way, we can add events to this calendar and stay up-to-date on our upcoming plans together.

Projects.Title: Loann's Salon
Projects.About: A website created to promote online presence for a cosmetologist.
